title: Chintz Fragment, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordant for 2 reds and purple applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied (probably by immersion) over resist (chintz).
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 18 x 25 cm (7 1/16 x 9 13/16 in.)
description: Stripes of roses and ribbons on different background. Three pieces sewn together.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragment, 1750–1800.
1750–1800. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordant for 2 reds and purple applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied (probably by immersion) over resist (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-45.
